results.idea: Short-term mean reversion on industry-relative 5-day return
results.description: Use mdl177_2_pricemomemtummodel2_indrelrtn5d_ (coverage 1.0, reliable). Confidence set to 0.72 based on well-known short-term reversal patterns and full coverage.

results.idea: 12-month momentum scaled by volatility (risk-adjusted momentum)
results.description: Combine 12-month momentum with 24-month residual variance to penalize noisy names. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION3 skipped (both coverages >0.6).
